description.en: PhD students attend seminars, conferences, workshops and other scientific meetings, devoted to developmental biology or general zoology, to gain knowledge from presentations and academic discussions. Every PhD student has to make at least six presentations during the course. The results of PhD and MSc studies are disputed in seminars before submitting the thesis manuscript to the faculty. The articles and presentations of graduate student aimed at spreading the ideas, understandings and advances in developmental biology and biology in general, among people outside the scientific community could also be considered as a part of course.
description.et: Doktorandid külastavad erialaga seotud seminare, kollokviume, konverentse ja teisi erialanõupidamisi, kus nad kuulavad ettekandeid ning osalevad akadeemilistes diskussioonides. Doktorandid peavad kursuse jooksul ka ise esinema seminaridel ja muudel teadusüritustel kokku vähemalt kuue ettekandega arengubioloogilisel või üldzooloogilisel teemal. Seminarides arutatakse ühiselt läbi ka valminud doktori- ja magistritööde tulemused enne nende esitamist kaitsmisele. Seminaril läheb arvesse ka eriala populariseerimisega seotud tegevus.

objectives.en: Training of PhD students for gaining experience in oral presentation of own results and in academic disputations in developmental biology
objectives.et: Doktorantidele esinemiskogemuse ja oma erialal teaduslikus väitluses osalemise vilumuse andmine
